game.name: Templar Battleforce
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An addictive mix of strategic combat and army building, with the precision of an RPG. Design your squad members' exact build of equipment and talents to create unique fireteam combinations. Step into the pilot suit of a Leviathan mech, lead the Templar Knights in turn-based tactical warfare.
